translation.en: [manager] May I take your order, ma'am?
I have a reservation under Grace.
Uh, really nice to meet you.
Ah, and it's nice to meet you. [chuckles]
[Grace] Declared missing from a shipwrecked ocean liner,
translation.zh: ‎您在远洋轮船沉船事故中被报失踪

translation.en: only to return alive after five-and-a-half years on a desert island.
translation.zh: ‎在荒岛上生活了五年半 才活着回来

translation.en: Ever since I first read your story, I've been dying to turn it into a book.
translation.zh:
‎从我第一次读到你的故事
‎就非常期待把它写成一本书

translation.en: You're way more handsome in real life than in your pictures.
-[Grace] You haven't had lunch yet, right? -Uh...
Um, not yet. That's good. I ordered ahead for us.
translation.zh:
‎-还没有
‎-那正好 我已经提前点好了

translation.en: Let's just cover the basics while we're waiting for our lunch to come.
translation.zh:
‎我们等午餐送来的期间
‎先简单聊一聊

translation.en: Is it all right if I record?
How have you been since your return?
translation.zh: ‎你回来之后 过得怎么样？

translation.en: Adjusting to city life again has been a little rough.
translation.zh: ‎重新适应城市生活 有一点艰难

translation.en: Oh! Are there strange habits that you can't break from your life in the wild,
translation.zh:
‎有没有什么您依然无法改掉的
‎野外生活养成的奇怪习惯？

translation.en: or running around town with only a spear and a loincloth?
translation.zh:
‎或者只穿着内裤
‎手里拿着长矛 在城市里走动？
‎没有 完全没有那种习惯

translation.en: It's just it hasn't been easy being around this many people.
translation.zh: ‎我只是还不习惯身边围绕着这么多人

translation.en: Well, I really appreciate you doing this interview.
translation.zh: ‎我真的很感激您同意参加这次采访

translation.en: I had heard you were turning down everybody that asked for one.
translation.zh: ‎我听说您一直拒绝所有要求采访的人

translation.en: Well, I've been rather torn about that.
translation.zh: ‎对于采访 我一直很担心

translation.en: I've been worried that no one would believe what I've been through,
translation.zh: ‎害怕别人不相信我经历的事情

translation.en: But there are some remarkable little creatures
translation.zh: ‎但那里有一些神奇的小生物

translation.en: that the world should hear about.
But weren't you stranded on the island all alone?
translation.zh: ‎你不是独自一人被困荒岛吗？

translation.en: I was alone, and yet I wasn't.
translation.zh: ‎我是独自一人 但又不是

translation.en: I floated in a ducky tube until I spotted an island.
translation.zh:
‎我在一个鸭子浮排上漂
‎直到我看到了一个岛

translation.en: it took five steps to walk from one end of it to the other.
translation.zh: ‎从一端走到另一端 五步就走穿了

translation.en: [Chuck] And after six long months alone on the island,
translation.zh:
‎在那个荒岛上
‎独自生活了漫长的六个月后

translation.en: The bugs couldn't be real, though.
Truth is, I didn't believe it at first, either.
translation.zh: ‎其实 最开始我也不相信

translation.en: Being stranded on an island with weird little bugs like them.
translation.zh:
‎被困在荒岛上
‎岛上还有它们那样的奇怪小虫子

translation.en: Oh, could you describe again how the bugs looked?
translation.zh:
‎您可以再描述一下
‎这些虫子长什么样吗？
‎还有 您给它们取名了吗？

translation.en: The red one who's always ticked off is Red.
translation.zh: ‎红色的那个 总生气的那个叫小红

translation.en: And the stretched-out long one's name is Yellow.
translation.zh: ‎拉伸的那个长的名字叫小黄

‎-小黄
‎-我把他们两个一起叫做…

translation.en: Uh, yes! There were two bugs, and he called them...
[Chuck] Yeah. A primitive one living in the jungle.
translation.zh:
‎对 还有一个生活在丛林中的
‎原始的虫子

translation.en: Like a cave bug or bug Tarzan.
translation.zh: ‎像洞穴虫一样 或者说像… ‎泰山虫

translation.en: [Chuck] After that, they were always together.
translation.zh: ‎在那之后 他们总是在一起

translation.en: -[Grace] They were always... -Red had the biggest crush on her.
Turns out bugs are just like little slimy people.
translation.zh: ‎原来虫子就像黏糊糊的小人一样

translation.en: I see that you don't believe me either.
Hey, I really don't not believe you.
translation.zh: ‎喂 我真的没有不相信你

translation.en: Unexplainable stuff happens all the time in this world.
translation.zh:
‎在这个世界上
‎总在发生一些无法解释的事情

translation.en: [Grace] Just the fact that you were stranded and came back is an incredible story.
translation.zh:
‎就像你被困荒岛 奇迹生还
‎这就很不可思议

translation.en: Um, then it was you and these three bugs stuck on the island together the whole time?
translation.zh:
‎所以 一直以来 是你和这些虫子
‎被困在这个荒岛上？

translation.en: Well, no. It wasn't just me and the bugs.
translation.zh: ‎不 不只有我和几个虫子
‎住嘴 你们这两只臭虫子！

translation.en: [giggles] Are you serious? A singing seal?
Yes. Whenever I heard Clara's song, I felt happy and warm.
translation.zh: ‎是的 每次我听到克拉拉唱歌 ‎我都感觉幸福而温暖

translation.en: Bugs that act like little people and a singing seal?
translation.zh:
‎像小人一样的虫子
‎还有唱歌的海豹？

translation.en: What comes next? Does an alien visit the island in a UFO?
translation.zh:
‎接下来还有什么？
‎外星人坐着飞碟来岛上了吗？

translation.en: Ooh! I was a massive band geek.
[chuckles] We didn't hit it off at first. But I guess I owe him,
translation.zh:
‎最开始我们相处得不好
‎但算我欠他的吧

translation.en: because he helped me build the boat that got me home.
translation.zh: ‎因为他帮我建造了带我回家的船

translation.en: Great! I'm very happy to hear that.
translation.zh: ‎太好了！听你这么说 我很欣慰

translation.en: What kinds of things did you eat on the island to survive?
translation.zh: ‎你在岛上为了存活 都吃些什么呢？

translation.en: I was hungry all the time.
-Huh? -Let me tell you something about fish.
They don't care if you caught them fair and square!
translation.zh:
‎它们不在乎你抓到它们
‎手段是否光明正大

translation.en: Although, Larva helped expand my dinner menu.
translation.zh: ‎不过 臭屁虫帮我扩展了食谱

translation.en: [Chuck] The savory aroma of seaweed enfolded my entire body.
translation.zh: ‎海藻愉悦的香气包围了我的全身

translation.en: It was like waltzing with the waves.
And that ribbon of sweetness on top,
translation.zh:
‎上面的一条酱料的甜香
‎让我的所有感官

translation.en: is making all my senses do somersaults in sheer delight!
translation.zh:
‎上面的一条酱料的甜香
‎让我的所有感官 ‎愉悦地尽情翻滚

translation.en: [Chuck] It's the island on a plate!
We're about to eat our entire island!
[Chuck] I am one with this fish.
Yes! Smack me with your life force!
But there's deeper flavor. True treasure!
translation.zh:
‎但还有更深层次的风味
‎真正的宝藏！

translation.en: Felt only in a humpback whale's bellybutton.
translation.zh: ‎只能在座头鲸的肚脐眼里找到！

translation.en: Dare I say, the entire earth is in my mouth, massaging my taste buds!
translation.zh:
‎我敢说整个地球都在我口中
‎攻击我的味蕾！

translation.en: [Chuck's mom] It's all right, my dear boy.
Mom, can I please have one more bowl?
translation.zh: ‎妈妈 我可以再来一碗吗？

translation.en: Sounds gross, but it was so good.
translation.zh: ‎听起来很恶心 但吃起来很美味

translation.en: Mister, your story's the funniest thing ever!
translation.zh: ‎先生 你的故事真是太有趣了！

translation.en: You know you're not supposed to bother the customers.
translation.zh: ‎你知道 你不应该打扰顾客

translation.en: Uh, no, I'm fine with her hearing. -You? -Huh?
translation.zh: ‎没事 我不介意她在这里 你呢？

translation.en: Mm, uh, all right, yeah! She's very welcome.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 没事 这里欢迎她
‎好 我会安静的 爸爸

translation.en: [Grace] Well, shall we get back to it?
Can you tell us about Larva in greater detail?
translation.zh: ‎可以给我们再详细讲讲臭屁虫吗？

translation.en: Hmm. Well, uh... One minute, they're at each other's throats,
translation.zh:
‎额… 它们上一秒还针锋相对
‎争执不休

translation.en: then, turn around, and they're risking their lives for each other.
translation.zh: ‎下一秒就能为对方冒生命危险

translation.en: How long has it been since I've had fish?
[grunts] I've had enough of you brats! Go away!
translation.zh:
‎我已经受够你们两个讨厌鬼了！
‎走开！

translation.en: [grunting] Take that! [Chuck] You guys ruin everything!
-Lucky me! -[flame crackles] Here we go! Here we go!
Just let me grill my yummy fishy.

translation.zh: ‎好 鱼儿 我们刚才到哪了？

translation.en: Why are you doing this? Why? Why?
Oh, please don't let it go out!
Hold on, flame, here I come!
translation.zh: ‎火焰 坚持住 我来了！

translation.en: It's burning! I win! I win! [laughs]
[narrator] The life of a pollack fish.
After the narrow escape, the pollack's relief is short-lived
translation.zh: ‎侥幸逃脱后 鳕鱼并没有轻松太久

translation.en: for there are countless dangers that lurk in the ocean.
translation.zh: ‎因为海洋中潜伏着无数的危险

translation.en: However, in the fierce struggle for survival with its natural enemies,
translation.zh:
‎然而 在与天敌
‎进行的激烈生存斗争中

translation.en: the pollack has become stronger and smarter.
translation.zh:
‎这条鳕鱼变得越来越强大
‎越来越聪明

translation.en: Our pollack turns out to be a female.
With spawning season upon her, many males begin their overtures.
translation.zh: ‎随着繁殖季节的到来 ‎很多雄性开始示好

translation.en: The flashy movements of one male are eye-catching.
translation.zh: ‎一条雄性华丽的泳姿十分吸引眼球
‎于是开始了鳕鱼之间的爱情

translation.en: a hundred thousand to a million little fishy miracles.
translation.zh: ‎数十万、数百万的小鱼的奇迹

translation.en: And when the time comes, they will leave their parents' embrace
translation.zh: ‎等到时机成熟 ‎它们便会离开父母的怀抱

translation.en: to start a new journey in the vast world.
translation.zh: ‎在广阔的天地开始新的旅程

translation.en: Like their parents, they must survive many hardships and seek out a partner,
translation.zh:
‎正如他们的父母一样
‎它们也要经历很多苦难 ‎寻找一个伴侣

translation.en: so that they may fill the world with little miracles of their very own.
translation.zh: ‎才能给世界带来它们自己的小奇迹

translation.en: The life of a pollack fish.
Those bugs are like a phoenix or something.
translation.zh:
‎-好棒！
‎-这些小虫子像凤凰似的

translation.en: Yes, they are. Those little boogers could survive any danger ever! Uh...
translation.zh: ‎是的 ‎那些小臭屁虫能逃脱任何危险

translation.en: -Uh... -Chuck. Lots of people seem interested in this story of yours.
translation.zh:
‎查克 似乎很多人
‎都对你的故事非常感兴趣

translation.en: It's the first time that's happened.
-[Wendy] Mister! -Huh? Please! Please keep telling us your story!
translation.zh: ‎先生… 拜托你继续讲你的故事！

translation.en: This is the best story I've heard in my 84 years on Earth.
translation.zh:
‎这是我在地球上的84年中
‎听过的最棒的故事

translation.en: So true! I'm dying to try some of that tasty bug cuisine.
translation.zh:
‎说得太对了！
‎我真的好想尝尝那些虫子做的美味

translation.en: Your lunch is on me, if you agree to tell us some more.
translation.zh:
‎你的午餐免单
‎只要你愿意给我们继续讲故事

translation.en: Are you all right with them hearing the rest of the interview?
translation.zh:
‎你愿意让他们继续听
‎接下来的采访吗？

translation.en: I'm really touched you all wanna hear what I went through.
translation.zh:
‎你们都这么想听我的经历
‎让我十分感动

translation.en: If I'm honest here, this is hard to swallow.
translation.zh: ‎其实 说实话 ‎这些故事真的很难消化

translation.en: It sounds like a fantasy movie.
And you haven't heard the half of it.
I haven't even gotten to the crazy stuff.
translation.zh: ‎我还没有讲到… ‎最疯狂的部分

translation.en: Huh? Why is it so cloudy today?
Ah, who cares? I've still got the best boat.
translation.zh: ‎谁在乎呢？我还是有最好的船

translation.en: Did I ever tell you until college,
translation.zh: ‎我告诉过你们嘛？我上大学之前

translation.en: I was on the soccer team!
It's all because of you, bugs!
-[thunder rumbles] -[Chuck] It's all because of you, bugs!
Ah, this ends right now, you hear?
translation.zh: ‎立刻给我停止 听到了吗？

translation.en: You're done living up to your name.
I can't wait to turn them into puddles of goo on the beach.
translation.zh:
‎我真想立刻
‎把它们变成沙滩上的一滩黏液

translation.en: -[Chuck] A bug! A bug is me! -[farts]
What have you done to me, you horrible nightmare?
translation.zh:
‎你对我做了什么？
‎你这个恐怖的噩梦！

translation.en: Sorry, I pushed you so darn hard.
I'm a gross and revolting ugly bug.
translation.zh: ‎我是一个恶心的、讨厌的丑虫子

translation.en: Chicken tried to eat me whole.
I just thought of them as dumb little awful bugs.
translation.zh: ‎我以为它们是愚蠢的小臭虫子

translation.en: -[ship horn blares] -Huh? What? Sounds like... Oh, my!
[Chuck] Look. Yum, yum, yum! You know you want it!
translation.zh: ‎来吧！美味！ ‎你肯定想被我吃掉的！

translation.en: Not now! Let go of me!
Please! That boat was my ticket back home!
translation.zh: ‎求你了！那艘船是我回家的票

translation.en: Of course, it was only a dream.
translation.zh: ‎是啊 肯定只是一场梦啊

translation.en: Why, you little rotten bugs! Think that's funny, do you?
translation.zh:
‎你们这些小臭虫子！
‎你们觉得好玩吗？

translation.en: [Chuck] I'm sorry for acting so mean.
After that stuff, I was able to understand them better.
translation.zh: ‎那件事之后 我能够更懂它们了

translation.en: Uh! It was a force of habit.
So you're telling us you shared a bond with your bug buddies?
translation.zh:
‎所以 你是在告诉我们
‎你和你的那些小虫子产生了感情？

translation.en: Yeah. But not just my bug buddies.
translation.zh: ‎对 但不只是和我的那些小虫子

translation.en: We were trying to survive together, after all.
translation.zh: ‎毕竟我们一起努力 想要生存下去

translation.en: -[chef] Oh! -Wendy, it's all right. Daddy's here, darling.
translation.zh: ‎温蒂 没事的 宝贝 有爸爸在

translation.en: Looks like we're in for some temperamental weather.
The weather on the island was absolutely cuckoo.
Either burning hot or freezing cold.
translation.zh: ‎不是热得像火炉 就是冷得像冰窖

translation.en: [Chuck] Freak tornadoes would rip up out of nowhere.
[Chuck] Why have icebergs completely surrounded the island?
translation.zh: ‎为什么让冰山完全包围了这座岛啊？

translation.en: -[flame crackles] -I'm not gonna be an icicle.
We have to burn everything we can.
translation.zh: ‎我们必须要烧掉能烧的一切！

translation.en: There's nothing else to burn. [Chuck] What do we do?
translation.zh:
‎没有什么东西可以烧了！
‎我们怎么办？
‎克拉拉 你怎么飞起来了？

translation.en: [Chuck] Is that the... eye of the storm?
The storm's eye is an actual eye?
-[Booby mutters] -Well, let's give it a poke.
This is pretty messed up right here.
We've got to put that big eye out!
[Chuck] If I hadn't seen it with my own eyes, I wouldn't believe it myself.
translation.zh:
‎如果不是我亲眼见过
‎我也不会相信的

translation.en: [Granny] Any of them wear glasses, you think?
Um, so, then, tell us how you got off the island.
translation.zh:
‎那你给我们讲讲
‎你是怎么离开那座岛的

translation.en: -Yeah. -Tell us how you escaped! Yes, do that!
translation.zh:
‎-告诉我们 你是怎么逃跑的！
‎-对 讲吧！

translation.en: That's what I was thinking the whole time I was there.
translation.zh:
‎我在那里的所有时间
‎我一直都在想 怎么回家

translation.en: [Chuck] But I failed to escape so many times.
-I don't even know how many rafts I made. -Hmm.
translation.zh: ‎我都不知道自己做过多少个木筏

translation.en: ...something happened that meant we had to leave the island.
translation.zh:
‎发生了一件事
‎让我们不得不离开那座岛

translation.en: How can we ever get across that?
[grunts] Right. Come on. [Chuck] It's live or die time.
translation.zh: ‎好！加油！生死存亡的时刻到了

translation.en: I guess this is how I'm going to die.
I'm gonna die for acting nice.
I'm such a dumb, dumb, stupid--
This is the end of it all.
To ending this after all the suffering.
translation.zh: ‎我经受的苦难 都要结束了

translation.en: I thought if I just got off the island, then I'd be fine.
translation.zh: ‎我以为我离开那座岛 就会没事

translation.en: God, are you gonna end me this way?
translation.zh: ‎上帝 你要这样抛弃我吗？
‎谢谢你们 亲爱的朋友们

translation.en: Where did all the flying fish come from?
You know, thank goodness you guys are here.
translation.zh: ‎你们知道嘛 谢天谢地 你们都在这里

translation.en: Then I said farewell to everyone and I was alone.
translation.zh:
‎然后我和大家说了再见
‎我就从此一个人了

translation.en: Uh, but still, you at least were able to return home safely.
But I lost the family I found there.
translation.zh: ‎是啊 但我… ‎失去了在那里找到的家人

translation.en: I wonder if they're all all right.
I'm sure your little bug friends are safe and happy somewhere.
translation.zh:
‎我相信你的虫子朋友们
‎一定在某个地方 平安、开心地生活

translation.en: [manager] You said yourself they never die.
translation.zh: ‎你自己也说了 他们永远不会死

translation.en: -[Wendy] They're strong. -[Granny] We're right, you know.
translation.zh:
‎-他们很强大
‎-其实 你说得对

translation.en: And they keep on smiling, no matter what.
translation.zh: ‎不管发生什么 他们都能保持微笑

translation.en: Please tell us other adventures you had with Larva.
translation.zh: ‎给我们讲讲你和臭屁虫的冒险

translation.en: I'll tell you about the time me and Larva went shark fishing.
translation.zh:
‎我给你们讲
‎我和臭屁虫去钓鲨鱼的经历

translation.en: We got stuck right in a big humpback whale's blowhole.
translation.zh:
‎我们被困在
‎一只巨大座头鲸的呼吸孔里

translation.en: [manager] It's been great. Come back anytime.
translation.zh: ‎今天我过得很开心 欢迎再来

translation.en: Well, that was certainly something else.
-I don't remember having a nicer talk. -Uh...
translation.zh: ‎这是我经历过的 最友善的谈话了

translation.en: Thanks very much for talking to me today.
I realized today it's not as important everyone believe me as I thought it was.
translation.zh:
‎我以前想让所有人相信我
‎我今天意识到 那其实那根本不重要

translation.en: As long as I still remember my friends, I'll remember it's all true.
translation.zh:
‎只要我还记得我的朋友
‎我记得这一切是真实的 就够了

translation.en: [Chuck] Whether people believe it all really happened,
translation.zh: ‎人们是否相信这些是真实发生的

translation.en: I finally truly feel like I've completely left the island behind.
translation.zh:
‎我终于真正感觉到
‎自己完全将那座岛抛在身后了

translation.en: Well, we're happy to have you back, Chuck.
I won't forget your help. Ever.
[Grace] To be honest, when I first heard his story,
translation.zh: ‎说实话 我第一次听说他的故事时

translation.en: I thought he was a big, lying liar pants.
Even now, I'm still not sure I believe all of it.
translation.zh:
‎即便到了现在
‎我也不能确定自己完全相信

translation.en: But I've written this book with the earnest hope
translation.zh: ‎但我用最殷切的希望写下这本书

translation.en: that everyone will hear of his amazing experiences,
translation.zh: ‎希望所有人能听到他传奇的经历

translation.en: and the special friends he made on the island.
translation.zh:
‎还有他在岛上
‎结交的那些特别的朋友们

translation.en: And I hope people enjoy my writing too.
[Grace] Could it all be hooey in bunk?
Everyone who heard Chuck's brave, intense story,
translation.zh:
‎所有听到查克勇敢
‎动人心弦故事的人

translation.en: -myself included... -[Wendy giggles] [Grace] ...felt almost transported to the island themselves.
translation.zh:
‎包括我自己 都感觉身临其境
‎被送到了岛上

translation.en: It was clearly real to Chuck.
-And frankly... -Huh? -[groans] -...that's good enough for this writer.
translation.zh: ‎说实话 对本作者来说 也足够真实

translation.en: [Grace] I hope it's real to all who read this book as well.
translation.zh:
‎我希望对所有读了这本书的读者
‎也是真实的

translation.en: [Chuck] Oh, no, no. I just left.
